This looks like a completely different problem.
You are using Eclipse build I20060331-2000 which is
quite outdated already. I assume this is Eclipse 3.2M5 or M6.
I'd suggest to install RC4 or the upcoming RC5.
If the install problem persists, please file a different bug
because this stack trace is not related to the original one.
Resolving to duplicate again.
